/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's daily hustle and bustle. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the dynamic scene below.
